review: We LOVE it! Super easy to setup and use. We have watched nothing on regular cable since getting the Fire Stick! And the music selection is amazing, such an awesome way to listen to all your favorites. I highly recommend the Fire Stick to all Prime Members and anyone thinking about becoming a Prime Member. Worth every single penny!
author: Cassie Sterling

review: Im very happy with the fire stick
author: Jean Pierre Pujol

review: We are still learning the ins & outs of the Fire TV stick and Amazon Prime but it's a fun 'learning curve'!
author: NH booklady "booklady"

review: Easy to install. Very happy with my purchase.
author: mommabird

review: Satisfied. Works as expected. Nice price. Love that it has a remote. Was originally going to get the chromecast, but it doesn't come with one. Never heard of the fire stick until I went into Best Buy.
author: Pamela Mattern
